trans-unit.source: Specifies which registry view to target on a 64-bit operating system.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ver o registo de destino num sistema operativo de 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: On the 64-bit version of Windows, portions of the registry are stored separately for 32-bit and 64-bit applications.
trans-unit.target: A versão de 64 bits do Windows, partes do registo são armazenadas em separado para aplicações de 32 bits e 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: There is a 32-bit view for 32-bit applications and a 64-bit view for 64-bit applications.
trans-unit.target: Há uma vista de 32 bits para aplicações de 32 bits e uma vista de 64 bits para aplicações de 64 bits.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a registry view when you use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenBaseKey%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%28Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive%2CSystem.String%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryView%29> methods, and the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A> property on a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar uma vista de registo quando utiliza o <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenBaseKey%2A>e <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%28Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive%2CSystem.String%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryView%29>métodos e o <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A>propriedade um <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>objeto.</xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%28Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive%2CSystem.String%2CMicrosoft.Win32.RegistryView%29> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenBaseKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you request a 64-bit view on a 32-bit operating system, the returned keys will be in the 32-bit view.
trans-unit.target: Se solicitar uma vista de 64 bits num sistema operativo de 32 bits, as chaves devolvidas será na vista de 32 bits.
